attributes.action: Drug test all MP’s. Plain an simple too many MP’s have admitted to taking drugs.
attributes.additional_details: As of lately numerous news reports and MPs have admitted to taking drugs. Drug addict should not be involved in governing the people.
attributes.background: As we have found out in the last few weeks MPs have admitted to taking class A drugs. (Not Marijuana which is a plant.) Anyone serving in politics should be tested for drugs. Drugs are used by criminals and criminals should not be members of Parliament. Drug test all MP’s.
